messages.title: Dear friend,
messages.content: Serving as your MP for the last five years has been the greatest privilege of my life. Cheltenham is home. It’s where I was born, where I live and where before I was an MP, where I worked a home. It's been great to see people come together to fight for our local services and our green spaces, and I'm proud to have fought alongside them.

In recent years, we've faced threats to our local health services, our rail network, our countryside, our local policing and much beside. One of the things I love about Cheltenham is the tremendous community spirit we have here.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It will be a close race between me and the Conservative, so every vote will count.

issues.governance: Personally I'd rather see stronger independent voices forcing them all to listen and co-operate more.
issues.health: In recent years, we've faced threats to our local health services

housing.content: It's been great to see people come together to fight for our local services and our green spaces

leaflet.personalStatement: Serving as your MP for the last five years has been the greatest privilege of my life.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fighting for the protection of the green spaces and local services in Cheltenham.

endorsements.endorsement: have kept me busy as an MP for the last 5 years
has been a terrific support to me locally
